SELECT A.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE, A.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME, B.CHILD_TBL_TYPE PRODUCT_MTRL_CLSFC_NAME, A.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1, A.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_2, H.packaging_Item PRODUCT_INFO_STND_2_NAME, F.CHILD_TBL_TYPE PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1_NAME, G.CHILD_TBL_TYPE PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2_NAME, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE PRODUCT_UNIT_NAME from Product_Info_tbl A inner join DTL_TBL B on A.PRODUCT_MTRL_CLSFC = B.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL C on A.PRODUCT_UNIT = C.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL F on A.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = F.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL G on A.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = G.CHILD_TBL_NO left outer join Paldang_Packaging_Standard_tbl H on A.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_2 = H.packaging_No where A.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE like concat('%',#{itemCode},'%')
and PRODUCT_MTRL_CLSFC in (#{condition})

SELECT A.BOM_ID, A.BOM_Parent_ItemCode, A.BOM_ItemCode, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME BOM_ItemName, B.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 BOM_STND_1, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_CLSFC_1_NAME, F.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_CLSFC_2_NAME, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_State, A.BOM_Qty, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_Unit_Name, A.BOM_ChildExist, A.BOM_Modifier, A.BOM_Modify_Date FROM BOM_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.BOM_ItemCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL C on B.PRODUCT_MTRL_CLSFC = C.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D on B.PRODUCT_UNIT = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL E on B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = E.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL F on B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = F.CHILD_TBL_NO where BOM_Parent_ItemCode = #{itemCode}

SELECT A.BOM_ID, A.BOM_Parent_ItemCode, A.BOM_ItemCode, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME BOM_ItemName, B.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 BOM_STND_1, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_CLSFC_1_NAME, F.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_CLSFC_2_NAME, C.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_State, A.BOM_Qty, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE BOM_Unit_Name, A.BOM_ChildExist, A.BOM_Modifier, A.BOM_Modify_Date, Z.Material_LotNo BOM_Material_LotNo FROM BOM_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.BOM_ItemCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL C on B.PRODUCT_MTRL_CLSFC = C.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL D on B.PRODUCT_UNIT = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL E on B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = E.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL F on B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = F.CHILD_TBL_NO left outer join Raw_Material_tbl Z on A.BOM_ItemCode = Z.Material_ItemCode and Z.Production_LotNo = #{LotNo} where BOM_Parent_ItemCode = #{itemCode}
